content.question: What is the volume of the solid generated when the region in the first quadrant bounded by the graph of <math alttext="y equals 2 x " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis, and the vertical line <math alttext="x equals 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> is revolved about the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis?

topic.text: 8.9: Volume with Disc Method - Revolving Around the x- or y-Axis
